rules_text:
Reach
[i]Elwind[/i] – When Lewyn, Windsong enters, return a creature you control to your hand. If you return Lewyn to your hand this way, discover 3. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
[i]Song of Shifting Seasons[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, untap target creature you control.
